title: Grading the Trae Young trade: How did the Hawks and Wizards fare?
content: Trae Young is headed from the Hawks to the Wizards for CJ McCollum and Corey Kispert. Which team fared best? We graded the trade.

title: Sources: Hawks end Young era, send G to Wiz
content: The Hawks are trading four-time All-Star Trae Young to the Wizards for CJ McCollum and Corey Kispert, sources said.

title: Chiefs 'aware' of abuse allegations by Rice's ex
content: The Chiefs acknowledged Wednesday that they are aware of domestic violence allegations made by a woman who is the ex-girlfriend of Rashee Rice, with the team saying it's in communication with the league and will have no additional comment at this time.

title: Jim Harbaugh hails John, hopes he's NFC-bound
content: Jim Harbaugh doesn't expect his older brother John to be out of a job very long but just hopes his next landing spot isn't in the AFC, where the Chargers reside. "As I told him, whatever team he goes to is going to be formidable," Jim said.

title: Lipsey touted as best PG in nation after ISU win
content: Iowa State coach T.J. Otzelberger declared Tamin Lipsey the nation's best point guard after he led the Cyclones past Baylor and to the first 15-0 start in program history Wednesday night.

title: Scheffler to make '26 debut at American Express
content: World No. 1 Scottie Scheffler will make his 2026 debut at the American Express Championship later this month, tournament officials said Wednesday night. Scheffler also has committed to the WM Phoenix Open.

title: Sources: Rockies, Lorenzen agree to $8M contract
content: Right-hander Michael Lorenzen and the Rockies are in agreement on a one-year, $8 million contract that includes a club option, sources told ESPN.

title: Jerry Jones: Goal is to retire with most SB wins
content: Cowboys owner Jerry Jones said Wednesday that his goal in life is to the retire as the owner with the most Super Bowl wins and that he has "work to do" to catch the Patriots' Robert Kraft.

title: HOF goalie Hall, who started 502 in a row, dies
content: Glenn Hall, a Hockey Hall of Famer whose streak of 502 consecutive starts as a goaltender remains an NHL record, has died. He was 94.

title: üèà Our latest NFL mock draft predicts Picks 1-32
content: Which QB fits with the Raiders at No. 1? How high could Jeremiyah Love go? Will the Buckeyes run the first round? Let's project the first 32 picks for April.

title: Connelly breaks down Miami-Ole Miss, Oregon-Indiana
content: Our deep dive into the semifinals dissects the matchups that will determine who moves on to the title game.

title: Roster overhaul, six pillars and the Pittsburgh Steelers: Inside the Kings' latest revamp
content: The Kings fired Mike Brown this time last season, but one year later don't seem any closer to finding their way.

title: Facing the Texans this postseason? Broncos? Seahawks? Good luck! Solak on the three elite NFL defenses
content: This year's playoffs will feature three superior defenses: the Texans, Broncos and Seahawks. What makes each so unstoppable?

title: Wetzel: Welcome to a new college football world, where the SEC is no longer undisputed king
content: The Big Ten is guaranteed to be playing for a third straight national title. Can the SEC find a way to dominate this new era like it did the previous one?

title: Who are MLB's top young stars? Ranking baseball's best players at every age from 16 to 25
content: Julio Rodriguez or Bobby Witt Jr.? Roman Anthony or Jackson Chourio? We rank baseball's best by birth year.

title: Ty Simpson declares for the NFL draft: What does it mean for the QB class, Alabama's next moves?
content: Simpson announced he will enter the 2026 NFL draft. Is he a first-rounder? Which teams could be good fits? And who could replace him at Alabama?

title: Best way to an Eagles defensive lineman's heart -- and performance? Meatballs
content: Vic Fangio introduced the Meatball Award this season for his defense to serve as that extra bit of motivation.

title: Live NBA trade tracker: Details for every deal of the 2025-26 season
content: What deals are getting done in the NBA? Here's every trade of the 2025-26 regular season, starting with the Hawks dealing away franchise star Trae Young.

title: Fresh start or back to square one? Either way, Man United are never dull
content: After the tumult of Ruben Amorim's dismissal, Darren Fletcher and United's 2-2 draw vs. Burnley was fittingly dramatic.

title: VAR review: Did Chelsea get away with what should've been a penalty for Fulham?
content: Chelsea could have given up a penalty to Fulham, but the VAR stuck with the on-field decision. Was it the right call?

title: Amber Glenn is finally ready for her Olympic moment
content: This week, Amber Glenn looks to defend her back-to-back national titles -- and become the oldest U.S. Olympic women's singles skater in 98 years.

title: Power Rankings: Who is really the top team in the Big 12?
content: Texas Tech, one of four unbeaten teams left in women's D-I, and Baylor enter the top 16 as UNC and Notre Dame exit.

title: Inside Raiders' lost 2025 season: Tom Brady's influence, private meetings and dysfunction
content: "Who would want the Raiders job?" The inside story of how the Raiders went from playoff hopes to the No. 1 pick and another fired coach.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Brock Purdy leads in passing TDs, Luther Burden III breaks out in 2026
content: With another fantasy season in the books, Eric Karabell makes some early bold predictions for the 2026 season.

title: How Trevor Lawrence's grill gift was kept a surprise -- and came together
content: The quarterback's grill came from a collaboration of his mom, wife, former Clemson teammate and the Jaguars social media team.

title: 'I had 23': Revisiting the sack ruling that separates Jared Allen and Myles Garrett
content: A 2011 Vikings sack that NFL officials changed a call on seemed to work in Browns' defensive end's favor.

title: Who will be Man United's next manager? 12 top candidates to replace Amorim
content: Whether Manchester United aim to hire quickly or wait until summer, here are the coaches they could be after.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal eye AFCON star Yan Diomande in over $100M deal
content: Arsenal are chasing the Premier League title, but it's not stopping them from exploring a summer deal for RB Leipzig winger Yan Diomande. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: MLB offseason intel: Trade rumors and free agency updates
content: Here's what we're hearing about Ketel Marte, Alex Bregman, Bo Bichette and much more as the hot stove heats back up.

title: Ranking the top American tennis players as 2026 begins
content: Coco Gauff won another major title in 2025, and Taylor Fritz continued to lead the American men. But who else is set to make a move in 2026?

title: Video: Iranian Cop Chased In Car, Shot Dead Amid Anti-Khamenei Protests
content: As protests over economic distress paralyse Iran's law and order situation, a video has emerged showing a cop being killed by unknown assailants in a drive-by shooting in the southeastern province of Sistan and Baluchestan.

title: Wife Can't Be Presumed To Be Earning At Interim Maintenance Stage: Delhi High Court
content: Wife cannot be presumed to be earning or being capable of maintaining herself at the stage of granting interim maintenance, the Delhi High Court has said.

title: OpenAI's ChatGPT Health Can Be Linked With Medical Records, Wellness Apps
content: OpenAI on Wednesday launched a ChatGPT Health tab that answers healthrelated questions and lets users upload medical records and connect wellness apps such as Apple Health and MyFitnessPal.

title: Woman Shot Dead By US Immigration Agent Was A Poet And Mother Of 3
content: A US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agent shot dead a woman in Minneapolis on Wednesday, officials said. Renee Nicole Good, 37, a resident of the Twin Cities, was shot a few blocks from her home.

title: A "No Congress Without Siddaramaiah" Remark, Then Priyank Kharge's Rebuttal
content: Karnataka Minister Priyank Kharge has asserted that the Congress's success cannot be attributed to any single leader, emphasising instead its 140-year organisational legacy.

title: Who Was Agnivesh Agarwal, Vedanta Chairman's Son Who Died In US
content: Vedanta chairman Anil Agarwal's son Agnivesh, 49, died in the US. He sustained injuries after a skiing accident in America and died of a cardiac arrest while undergoing treatment.

title: "Baseless": Sheikh Hasina Trashes Dhaka's India Claim Over Leader's Murder
content: Sheikh Hasina, Bangladesh's former prime minister, has addressed the accusation against her Awami League party of orchestrating the killing of Bangladeshi student Sharif Osman Hadi last month.

title: Lakhs In Banned, Foreign Currency Found With Kerala Beggar After Death
content: A shocking discovery was made in Kerala after a beggar who died after a road accident in Alappuzha was found to be carrying over Rs 4.5 lakh in cash.

title: Raj Thackeray's Big Warning To 'Marathi Manoos' If BJP Rules Civic Bodies
content: MNS chief Raj Thackeray has launched a scathing attack on the BJP, alleging that those seeking to separate Mumbai from Maharashtra are in power at the Centre and in the state.

title: Why Greenland Looks Bigger On The Map Than It Really Is
content: At first glance, Greenland appears almost as large as the entire continent of Africa on many world maps. In reality, Greenland is about 14 times smaller than Africa.

title: Sheikh Hasina On Why Bangladesh Is Becoming Unsafe For Minorities
content: Hasina claimed to have worked to "curb the emergence of domestic terror units" and ensure peaceful coexistence of all religious groups during her regime.

title: Google, AI Chatbot To Settle Lawsuit With US Woman After Son's Suicide
content: Google and artificial intelligence chatbot maker Character Technologies have agreed to settle a lawsuit from a Florida mother who alleged a chatbot pushed her teenage son to kill himself.

title: Amartya Sen Receives SIR Summons, Poll Official Explains Why
content: The office of the West Bengal Chief Electoral Officer (CEO) clarified that SIR hearing summonses to Nobel laureate Amartya Sen, cricketer Mohammed Shami and Bengali actor-turned-TMC MP Dev were part of a routine electoral verification process.

title: BJP MP Says Clean Water 'People's Responsibility' Amid Row Over Indore Deaths
content: BJP MP Gyaneshwar Patil's statement pinning the responsibility of ensuring clean water on citizens has added fire to an ongoing political row that began after 20 people died after consuming contaminated water in Indore's Bhagirathpura area.

title: Telangana Court Pauses Allotment Of Government Land To Waqf Board
content: The Telangana High Court has ordered status quo on the state government's decision to allot one acre of government land in Borabanda to the Telangana Waqf Board for setting up a Muslim graveyard.

title: "Darkest Day Of My Life": Vedanta Chairman's Son Dies Of Heart Attack
content: Vedanta Chairman Anil Agarwal expressed grief over the sudden death of his son, Agnivesh Agarwal, who died at the age of 49 following a cardiac arrest in New York.

title: Zepto Delivery Partner, 25, Killed In Bike-Bus Collision In Hyderabad
content: A 25-year-old delivery partner working for quick-commerce platform Zepto lost his life in a road accident in Hyderabad.

title: Bill Threatening 500% Tariff On India For Russia Oil Trade Gets Trump's Nod
content: US President Donald Trump has "greenlit" the bipartisan Russia Sanctions Bill, which could be used to penalise Moscow's trading partners, including India, China and Brazil, over their purchase of Russian oil, said Republican Senator Lindsey Graham.

title: Fast break: Time to take advantage of Joel Embiid's hot streak?
content: Joel Embiid's recent hot stretch of games creates a golden opportunity for fantasy managers, plus other fantasy insights from Eric Moody in his look around the NBA.

title: National shooting coach suspended after minor accuses him of sexual harassment
content: India's shooting coach Ankush Bhardwaj has been suspended by the National Rifle Association of India (NRAI) following a sexual harassment accusation by a minor shooter. An FIR has been filed against Bhardwaj, who was recommended by the NRAI for a coaching role post-Paris Olympics. The incident reportedly occurred last month after a training session.

title: BJP-AIMIM tie-up in Akot collapses hours after CM Fadnavis warning
content: An alliance between BJP and AIMIM in Akola's Akot town collapsed within hours after CM Devendra Fadnavis warned of action. The state BJP issued a show-cause notice to Akot MLA Prakash Bharsakale for promoting the arrangement without party consultation. A new front, 'Akot Nagar Vikas Manch', formed with support from multiple parties, claimed majority.

title: Khawaja Asif says Pakistan may not need IMF loans soon ‚Äî what's behind the claim
content: Pakistan's defence minister claims a surge in aircraft orders, potentially ending IMF reliance within six months. This follows a military standoff with India and discussions with Bangladesh and Saudi Arabia for JF-17 fighter jet deals. The Pak minister expressed strong confidence in these orders materializing, suggesting a significant boost to Pakistan's economy.

title: 'Completely wrong': Microsoft executive shutdown shuts down layoff rumours
content: Microsoft has vehemently denied widespread layoff rumors, with a top executive calling reports of up to 22,000 job cuts "completely false." Speculation, fueled by past workforce reductions and a significant AI investment, suggested cuts across Azure, Xbox, and sales. However, the company insists these claims are entirely fabricated, aiming to quell anxieties about its future workforce.

title: 'Amazing recovery': Damien Martyn discharged; thanks cricketing world for the love
content: Former Australian cricketer Damien Martyn is on the mend after a serious health scare involving meningitis, which led to him being hospitalised and placed in an induced coma.  He has now been discharged and is recovering at home, expressing gratitude for the outpouring of support from the cricketing community.  His journey continues, but his progress is described as amazing.

title: Schoolgirl gangraped in Kanpur: YouTuber arrested, sub-inspector absconding
content: A 14-year-old girl was allegedly abducted and gang-raped in Kanpur, leading to the arrest of a YouTuber and a manhunt for an absconding sub-inspector. Police Commissioner Raghubir Lal removed a Deputy Commissioner and suspended the local SHO for alleged lapses and distortion of facts. The victim's family reported initial police inaction and a cover-up attempt.

title: Musk says he's impressed with China; highlights its rapid EV & solar growth
content: Elon Musk humorously noted China's rapid adoption of his energy ideas, from EVs and solar to massive battery production. He highlighted China's dominance in these sectors, contrasting it with US potential. Musk emphasized batteries, like Tesla's Megapacks, as crucial for doubling US energy throughput without new power plants, especially for AI's growing demands.

title: 'Dhurandhar' BO collection: Ranveer Singh starrer nears Rs790cr
content: ‚ÄòDhurandhar‚Äô has achieved a historic fifth weekend, raking in Rs. 33.25 crore and pushing its Hindi net collection past ‚Çπ781 crore. This Aditya Dhar directorial is now set to break ‚ÄòPushpa 2‚Äôs record, a remarkable feat achieved solely through its Hindi version, unlike other Rs. 1000-crore club members. The film's consistent performance defies typical box office trends, solidifying its all-time blockbuster status.

title: Maduro‚Äôs ouster: Venezuela says 100 killed ‚Äòin cold blood‚Äô US strike
content: Venezuela's interior minister reported 100 deaths during a US military operation that ousted President Nicol√°s Maduro, who was wounded. Meanwhile, the US seized two Venezuela-linked oil tankers, including a Russian-flagged vessel, as part of intensified efforts to enforce sanctions on Caracas's oil shipments.

title: 'No WC at the cost of dignity': B'desh draws firm line; pushes ICC to shift matches to SL
content: Bangladesh's government has hardened its stance on playing the T20 World Cup in India, citing national dignity and cricketer security concerns. Dhaka will urge the ICC to relocate their matches to Sri Lanka, believing the global body misunderstands the gravity of the situation. Participation will not come at the cost of humiliation or compromised safety.

title: AGI feud intensifies: Here's what Sam Altman told Elon Musk about Google
content: Newly surfaced court documents reveal a 2023 exchange where Sam Altman called Elon Musk his hero, thanking him for OpenAI's founding while defending its mission. Despite acknowledging missteps, Altman insisted OpenAI prevented unilateral AGI control, a goal they both shared. Musk apologized for causing hurt but cited the "fate of civilization" as his justification.

title: 'Raped, killed and set on fire': Semi-naked charred body of woman found dumped in Hapur sugarcane field
content: Sensation prevailed in Uttar Pradesh's Hapur district after the burnt, semi-naked body of a woman, aged around 30, was recovered from a sugarcane field behind brick kilns in Lahadra village under the Bahadurgarh police station area, police said here on Thursday.

title: Late-night demolition drive sets off clashes near old Delhi
content: A demolition drive by MCD near Faiz-e-Ilahi Mosque in Turkman Gate led to stone-pelting and clashes, injuring five policemen. Authorities used tear gas and deployed drones to control the situation and identify suspects. Five individuals have been arrested for their involvement in the incident.

title: Video: US ICE officer shoots woman at point-blank range in Minneapolis ‚Äî how it unfolded
content: An ICE officer fatally shot a woman driving an SUV during an immigration raid in Minneapolis. US President Trump called the incident "horrible" and labeled the woman a "professional agitator" who "viciously" ran over the officer. The administration confirmed the shooting, stating the woman attempted to run over law enforcement.

title: Injury scare for India: Tilak Varma undergoes surgery; may return for final NZ T20I
content: A significant setback for India's T20 World Cup preparations, middle-order batter Tilak Varma has suffered an abdominal injury requiring surgery.  The 23-year-old's potential absence from the upcoming T20I series and the mega event next month opens doors for a T20 comeback for Shreyas Iyer. Varma's crucial role in the Asia Cup final is highlighted.

title: Toxic teaser out: Yash debuts as gangster Raya - here's the release date
content: Kannada star Yash returns with 'Toxic: A Fairy Tale for Grown-Ups', a gangster action drama set in 90s Goa. The recently released teaser showcases Yash as the menacing Raya, introducing a dark and intense narrative. The film, directed by Geetu Mohandas, features a star-studded cast and is slated for a March 19, 2026 release.

title: JJ Watt net worth in 2025: endorsements, investments, car collection and more
content: JJ Watt's remarkable NFL career saw him become a three-time Defensive Player of the Year and the first to achieve two 20-sack seasons.  His 12-year journey, marked by resilience and leadership, concluded with the Arizona Cardinals.  Beyond his $129 million in NFL salary, Watt amassed significant wealth through endorsements and investments.

title: ‚ÄòI forget‚Äô: Haryana man who has son after 10 daughters struggles to recall children‚Äôs names
content: Haryana showcases its gender paradox with contrasting births: a daughter celebrated with a traditional son's ritual, while an 11th son was welcomed after 10 daughters, highlighting both progress and persistent son preference. Despite awareness campaigns, deep-rooted bias remains evident in the state's transition.

title: WTC standings after Ashes: Australia tighten grip, England slip; India stay in contention
content: Australia solidified their WTC lead with a dominant Ashes win, while England's struggles continue, impacting their standings. This shift offers India a glimmer of hope, as they sit sixth and can capitalise on England's slide. The race for the WTC final is heating up with New Zealand, South Africa, and Sri Lanka also in contention.

title: Pune: Renowned ecologist Madhav Gadgil passes away at 83
content: Renowned ecologist Madhav Gadgil, celebrated for his work on the Western Ghats, passed away in Pune at the age of 83. He was honored by the UN in 2024 with the Champions of the Earth award for his significant contributions to the region's conservation. Gadgil also led a government panel studying the ecological impacts on the Western Ghats.

title: Bihar: SUV rams multiple vehicles near Gola Road in Patna, 4 injured; locals set car ablaze
content: An SUV rammed into roadside vehicles in Danapur, Patna, injuring four people, including a woman. Locals set the vehicle ablaze, which was later controlled by the fire brigade. The driver remains unidentified as the license plate was destroyed, but the owner is being traced via the engine number.

title: 500% tariffs ahead for India & China? Trump clears Russia sanctions bill; what it means
content: The Trump administration is threatening to penalize countries buying discounted Russian oil, a move that could impact India's energy imports and trade with the US. A bipartisan sanctions bill, approved by Trump, aims to pressure nations like India, China, and Brazil to cease Russian crude purchases, which the US argues funds Putin's war in Ukraine.

title: Four students die in car crash after hitting tree post birthday party
content: Four BBA students died in a high-speed car accident in Mokila late Wednesday night after a birthday celebration. The SUV carrying five students, including the birthday boy Sumit, collided with a tree while travelling towards Narsingi. One student, Nakshatra, survived with injuries. Authorities are investigating if drunk driving was a contributing factor.

title: ‚ÄòHow many doctors are there‚Äô: Sreeleela asks in an arts college
content: Actress Sreeleela experienced a humorous moment during 'Parasakthi' promotions in Kochi when she asked an arts college audience about doctors. Realizing her gaffe, she, along with co-stars Sivakarthikeyan and Ravi Mohan, burst into laughter. The lighthearted incident quickly went viral online, drawing amusing reactions from netizens. The film, directed by Sudha Kongara, marks Sreeleela's Tamil debut.

title: Forever layoff: Ongoing small-scale cuts erode job security
content: Forever layoff captures a quiet shift in modern work: Layoffs that never end, only repeat. Through Dickens‚Äôs fact-driven Coketown and Kafka‚Äôs unfinished trial, this analysis traces how endless uncertainty reshapes mindspace, productivity, trust, and power at work. Jobs remain, but assurance disappears. Careers no longer progress or conclude. They linger, alert, provisional, and permanently under review.

title: Who was Agnivesh Agarwal? Anil Agarwal‚Äôs son & Vedanta Group director passes away at 49
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi mourned the sudden passing of Vedanta Group director Agnivesh Agarwal, 49, who died of cardiac arrest after a skiing accident in the US. Agarwal, son of Anil Agarwal, was recovering well before the tragedy. He was a respected leader, sportsman, and musician, deeply committed to India's self-reliance and societal welfare.

title: Winter break 2026: Delhi schools closed amid cold wave as per DoE academic calendar
content: Delhi schools will remain shut until January 15, adhering to the Directorate of Education's winter vacation schedule for the 2025-26 academic year. This decision aims to protect students from harsh winter conditions. However, some parents have voiced concerns on social media about private institutions reopening early, urging authorities to ensure uniform adherence to the break.

title: Gold & silver price prediction today: Will gold & silver touch new record highs in coming days? Here's the outlook
content: Gold and silver price prediction: Abhilash Koikkara, Head - Forex & Commodities at Nuvama Professional Clients Group is of the view that gold and silver prices are touching new record highs and this is a phase of consolidation.

title: IT ministry calls Musk‚Äôs X reply ‚Äòinadequate,‚Äô demands action plan on Grok AI issue
content: India's IT Ministry has expressed concerns over obscene content generated by Elon Musk's chatbot Grok, demanding X (formerly Twitter) provide specific actions and preventive measures. The ministry seeks documented proof of compliance with IT rules and content standards, rejecting generic assurances from the social media platform.

title: Sewage in drinking water in Greater Noida: Several fall ill with vomiting, diarrhoea
content: Dozens of Greater Noida residents, including children, fell ill with vomiting, diarrhea, and fever after sewage contaminated the drinking water supply in Sector Delta 1. Authorities have repaired a leaking pipeline and distributed medicines, while residents fear a repeat of past tragedies and demand better infrastructure.

title: Enna thambi! 'You can't explain this at 14': Ashwin's awe sums up Sooryavanshi's rise
content: Fourteen-year-old batting sensation Vaibhav Sooryavanshi is making waves in cricket with astonishing performances.  Former India spinner Ravichandran Ashwin highlighted his recent scores, calling his talent inexplicable.  Sooryavanshi recently captained India U19 to a series win against South Africa with a century, showcasing his immense potential ahead of the U19 World Cup.

title: Quote of the day from Bhagavad Gita: 'Mind can be your greatest friend, or your worst enemy"
content: Lord Krishna's profound teaching from the Bhagavad Gita highlights the mind's dual nature: a powerful ally or a formidable foe. He emphasized that a disciplined, calm mind attracts positivity, while an uncontrolled one becomes a significant obstacle. Training the mind through meditation, self-discipline, detachment, and consistent practice is key to harnessing its potential and making it a true friend.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens in red; BSE Sensex below 84,950
content: Stock market today: Stock market today: Indian equity benchmark indices, Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, crashed in trade on Thursday. While Nifty50 went below 25,950, BSE Sensex dropped over 650 points.

title: NFL playoffs: Wild-card matchups, playoff teams and full postseason field
content: The NFL's 2025 regular season has concluded, with all 14 playoff teams and matchups confirmed. The Denver Broncos and Seattle Seahawks secured crucial first-round byes as top seeds. Wild-card weekend begins January 10, featuring intense single-elimination games, including the Carolina Panthers who surprisingly made the cut. Super Bowl LX is set for February 8.

title: Raising teenagers isn‚Äôt easy and here's how Jennifer Garner keeps it real
content: Jennifer Garner finds joy in raising teenagers, appreciating their coolness and growing awareness. She describes her parenting style as evolving, emphasizing listening and allowing independence over control. Garner focuses on her children's character and effort, a relatable approach for parents navigating modern pressures. Her grounded perspective highlights the importance of respect and encouragement for teens discovering themselves.

title: BMC polls: Sena candidate Haji Saalim stabbed during campaign in Bandra
content: Sena candidate Haji Saalim Qureshi was stabbed four times in the stomach while campaigning in Bandra East. Eyewitnesses reported an unknown assailant attacked him and fled. Police suspect political opponents and have lodged an attempt to murder case, forming multiple teams to apprehend the attacker.

title: 'Wife killer' living as carpenter caught by Police; jumped parole 26 years ago
content: A carpenter in Ludhiana, living under an assumed identity for 14 years, was apprehended by Delhi Police. He was a fugitive, having escaped parole in 2000 after being sentenced for his wife's murder in 1992.  The police tracked him down through a tip-off, ending his decade-long evasion.

title: Amid India-Bangladesh tensions, ex-Bangladesh player recalls help from Tendulkar, Ganguly
content: Former Bangladesh batter Rajin Saleh recalled receiving crucial batting advice from Sachin Tendulkar and Sourav Ganguly during a difficult 2004 series against India. Tendulkar advised him to mentally reset after each innings, while Ganguly urged him to play fearlessly. Saleh then scored in the 80s in the next match, crediting their support.

title: Filmmaker Gnanamuthu reacts to delays in censorship of Vijay's 'Jana Nayagan'
content: Thalapathy Vijay's highly anticipated film 'Jana Nayagan' faces a release day postponement due to pending certification from the CBFC. Filmmaker Ajay R Gnanamuthu voiced solidarity with the team amidst the delay. The Madras High Court has reserved its verdict, ordering a review by a new committee, impacting advance bookings and causing fan disappointment.

title: 'Dhurandhar' BO collection: Ranveer Singh starrer sets record as highest-earning Hindi film
content: 'Dhurandhar' continues its phenomenal box office streak, crossing Rs 1227 crore globally. The film has now become the highest-earning single-language (Hindi) movie, surpassing 'Pushpa 2: The Rule' and other blockbusters. Its fifth week collections remain strong, showcasing sustained audience interest even after a month of release.

title: Buy Greenland? Take it? Why? An old pact already gives Trump a free hand
content: President Trump's desire to acquire Greenland for national security is complicated. A 1951 defense pact already grants the US extensive military access and base-building rights. Despite this, Trump's talk of buying the island faces strong opposition from Greenlanders and Denmark, who emphasize self-determination and the island's inalienable status.

title: Ahead of U.S. Ambassador arrival, Trump okays 500% tariff Bill on Russian oil; withdraws from India-led ISA
content: U.S. Ambassador-designate Sergio Gor, who takes charge on January 12, 2026 has said ending India‚Äôs Russian oil imports is a ‚Äútop priority‚Äù¬†

title: Anbumani‚Äôs alliance talks with AIADMK illegal: PMK founder Ramadoss
content: PMK leader said he has been authorised by the General Council and the Executive Council to decide on electoral alliances. The party‚Äôs laws empower the founder as the sole decision-maker, added Mr. Ramdoss.

title: Anbumani flags steep decline in tapioca prices, urges T.N. govt. to fix procurement price
content: In a statement, he said the price has dropped from about ‚Çπ16,000 per tonne two years ago to around ‚Çπ4,700 per tonne now, and has severely affected farmers in districts such as Salem, Namakkal, Erode, and Dharmapuri

title: Major setback for India's green cause: Kharge on Madhav Gadgil's demise
content: Gadgil leaves behind an enduring imprint on research, teaching, and ecological conservation, and his departure is a major setback for the country's green cause, Mr. Kharge said

title: Vijay‚Äôs ‚ÄòJana Nayagan‚Äô, the last to court trouble, not the first
content: For Jana Nayagan, Vijay‚Äôs political message is clear: ‚ÄúI am coming.‚Äù However, fans will have to wait for his arrival on screen, and it might be delayed ‚Äî possibly for the last time

title: Mananchira-Vellimadukunnu road to be completed by February: Minister Mohammed Riyas
content: Minister Riyas said efforts were on to address the alleged negligence on the part of the contractors in speeding up the NH widening works in the Vadakara stretch

title: Steps needed to boost enrolment in government schools in Karnataka: Minister Madhu Bangarappa
content: The Minister stated that the introduction of LKG and UKG classes, and the launch of bilingual-medium schools had already led to an increase in enrolment, and officials must build on this momentum

title: Bombay High Court to hear PIL alleging mass rejection of BMC poll nominations
content: The petition alleges a pattern¬†favouring¬†the ruling party and demands ward‚Äëwise speaking orders and calls on SEC to restore nominations and bar rejections for defects¬†deemed¬†curable

title: Madhav Gadgil (1942-2026)
content: Renowned ecologist Madhav Gadgil passed away on January 7, 2026. We take a look at how his work made an impact in the country.

title: National shooting coach accused of sexually harassing minor in Faridabad; suspended by NRAI
content: Ankush Bhardwaj, a former pistol shooter, had served a doping ban in 2010 for the use of a beta-blocker during his competitive days

title: Operation resumes in Kathua to track down terrorists; one security person injured
content: The joint action by the Special Operations Group of J&K Police and other security forces was launched at Kahog village in Billawar on January 7th evening, leading to an encounter, says official

title: From heading Western Ghats panel¬†to helping establish world class centres in IISc, Madhav Gadgil had a long association with Karnataka
content: Madhav Gadgil headed the Western Ghats Ecology Expert Panel, also known as the Gadgil Committee, which made several recommendations to safeguard the fragile Western Ghats

title: RDPR Department considering Singapore technology to ensure water quality in Karnataka
content: The Minister told representatives of Singapore-based ZWEEC that a pilot project would be taken up to study the solutions on offer

title: Domicile certificates not valid for SIR hearings in Bengal: Official

title: Jabarkhet: can private reserves restore wildlife and keep tourism gentle?
content: Private reserves are popular in Africa. In India, however, responsible private reserves are more about potential than reality. In dissecting how wildlife returned to Jabarkhet Nature Reserve and how it has balanced tourism needs with conservation, it is possible to trace a model for private reserves in India

title: NFL futures: Seahawks enter playoffs as Super Bowl favorites, Rams right behind
content: The top two teams in the NFC West have the best odds to win the Super Bowl heading into the playoffs. The  Seattle Seahawks  are the favorites to win Super Bowl 60, following closely by the division rival  Los Angeles Rams . The AFC West-winning  Denver Broncos  have the third-best odds to win the Super Bowl as the top overall seed in the AFC. They, like the Seahawks, will have a bye in the first round. Here are the Super Bowl odds and conference championship odds for every team still in the hunt. Note: Odds by  DraftKings Sportsbook  and subject to change.

title: College football transfer portal: Tracking who's on the move
content: Max Olson ranks Cincinnati's Brendan Sorsby as the top player in the transfer portal and predicts a recruitment battle between Texas Tech and LSU. (1:04) College football's transfer portal officially opened at midnight ET on Jan. 2. However, players have been announcing their intentions to transfer since the regular season ended. By midday on Day 1, more than 4,500 Division I college football players have entered the transfer portal. Players now have until Jan. 16 to enter their name to transfer. It doesn't mean they have to find their new schools by then -- or that they can't return to their previous schools. We are tracking the notable players entering the portal as well as those players who will re-sign with their current schools. Here's the latest news and updates on how the 2026 season could be transformed.

title: ED raids TMC IPAC's house: Mamata hits out at Amit Shah; asks ‚Äòis this the job of home minister?‚Äô
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide.
